channel.title: Dump on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Dump on Today I Learned

item.description: sqlite3 has a .import [--csv] [--skip 1] FILE [TABLE] meta-command (docs). Also, for some reason my version of sqlite3 doesn’t respect any flags. Also, sqlite3 has a .dump meta-command that out puts pure SQL (plus a few sqlite PRAGMAs): docs
